original_title: Leema Creations wins international award of excellence in Interior Design and Décor
original_body_lines: Leema Creations has yet again proved that it is the best in the interior design industry by winning the prestigious South Asian Business Excellence Award 2023 for Brand Excellence in Interior Decor & Design for the fifth consecutive year.

South Asian Partnership Summit (SAPS), the organisers of this prestigious event, provided an international platform to celebrate and honour the award winners on 30 November, in the city of Male, Maldives Island.

The Award identifies the highest levels of achievement in the development of office and home architecture and interior design in both the residential and commercial sectors, focusing on service excellence, sustainability, high living standards, ergonomics, originality, and creativity, which is an independent endorsement of the company’s expertise and professionalism.

Leema said this remarkable achievement serves as a testament to the creativity, innovation, originality, inspiring practices, and excellence of the Leema team of design and manufacturing professionals. The award is presented to companies that have met the quality standards set by the industry. Leema’s commitment to challenge conventions, push boundaries, and create meaningful impacts for the future has met the appreciation of its valued customers, who consistently remain with Leema for their requirements.

Leema Creations, the most celebrated interior solutions provider in Sri Lanka, said it has been recognised by the interior and furniture industry both locally and internationally during the past two decades. Over the years, Leema has won the greatest number of Sri Lankan and international awards in the interior solution industry. The company has achieved great heights with its team of professionals and craftsmen specialising in interior design and furniture manufacturing and has proven a rich and proud history of excellence.
